ai.title: Car vs. Bus Classifier

ai.title: Cat vs. Dog Classifier

ai.title: Handwritten Digit Recognition
ai.description: Created a high-performing (90% accuracy) image classifier using TensorFlow and Keras to recognize handwritten digits from the MNIST dataset.
